verses.text: My song will be of \w the|strong="H0387"\w* mercies of \w the|strong="H0387"\w* Lord for ever: with my mouth will I make his faith clear to all generations.

\w For|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w*, \w Mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* strong \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w faith|strong="H0530"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* unchanging \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heavens.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* \w made|strong="H3559"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* agreement \w with|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* man \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* selection, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* \w made|strong="H3559"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* oath \w to|strong="H0559"\w* David \w my|strong="H3588"\w* servant;

\w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3772"\w* seed go \w on|strong="H7650"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* ever, \w your|strong="H3772"\w* kingdom \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* strong through all generations. (Selah.)

\w In|strong="H1755"\w* heaven let \w them|strong="H5704"\w* give \w praise|strong="H5769"\w* \w for|strong="H1129"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* wonders, \w O|strong="H1129"\w* Lord; \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* unchanging faith \w among|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* saints.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* comparison \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*? \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* among \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* gods?

O Lord \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* armies, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w strong|strong="H0410"\w* \w like|strong="H5439"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, O Jah? \w and|strong="H5439"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* unchanging faith \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3644"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* rule \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sea \w in|strong="H0430"\w* storm; \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H5439"\w* waves \w are|strong="H3068"\w* troubled, \w you|strong="H3644"\w* make \w them|strong="H5439"\w* calm.

Rahab \w was|strong="H3220"\w* crushed by \w you|strong="H0859"\w* like one wounded \w to|strong="H3220"\w* death; \w with|strong="H3220"\w* \w your|strong="H0859"\w* strong arm \w you|strong="H0859"\w* put \w to|strong="H3220"\w* flight all \w your|strong="H0859"\w* haters.

\w Yours|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w the|strong="H6340"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H6340"\w* earth \w is|strong="H2220"\w* \w yours|strong="H0859"\w*; \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* made \w the|strong="H6340"\w* world, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* everything which \w is|strong="H2220"\w* \w in|strong="H5797"\w* it.

\w Yours|strong="H0859"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* an arm \w of|strong="H8034"\w* power; strong \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w your|strong="H0859"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w and|strong="H6828"\w* high \w your|strong="H0859"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5973"\w* seat \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* kingdom \w is|strong="H3027"\w* resting \w on|strong="H3027"\w* righteousness \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* judging: mercy \w and|strong="H3027"\w* good faith come \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* face.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* breastplate \w is|strong="H7161"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord; \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* king \w is|strong="H7161"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Holy \w One|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7161"\w* Israel's.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* voice came \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* vision, saying, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* put \w the|strong="H3588"\w* crown \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* strong \w one|strong="H6918"\w*, lifting \w up|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* taken \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people.

\w I|strong="H0227"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* discovery \w of|strong="H5921"\w* David \w my|strong="H5921"\w* servant; \w I|strong="H0227"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* put \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H2623"\w* oil \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* head.

\w My|strong="H1732"\w* hand \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* support; \w my|strong="H1732"\w* arm \w will|strong="H5650"\w* give \w him|strong="H4672"\w* strength.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* deceit \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3559"\w* overcome \w him|strong="H5973"\w*; \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3559"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* troubled \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3027"\w* evil.

But \w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* not \w take|strong="H6485"\w* away \w my|strong="H6485"\w* mercy from \w him|strong="H6485"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* not be false \w to|strong="H5771"\w* \w my|strong="H6485"\w* faith.

(Selah.)

But \w you|strong="H5769"\w* \w have|strong="H0539"\w* \w put|strong="H0539"\w* \w him|strong="H0539"\w* away \w in|strong="H0539"\w* disgust; \w you|strong="H5769"\w* \w have|strong="H0539"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* angry with \w the|strong="H3559"\w* king \w of|strong="H0539"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* selection.

How \w long|strong="H3117"\w*, O Lord, \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* Keep \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* eyes? how \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath \w be|strong="H3117"\w* burning \w like|strong="H5921"\w* fire?

See \w how|strong="H4100"\w* short \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*; \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* made \w all|strong="H5704"\w* men \w for|strong="H3068"\w* no purpose?

Lord, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* earlier mercies? \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* oath \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* made \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* unchanging faith?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* bitter words \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* haters, \w O|strong="H0136"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, shaming \w the|strong="H3605"\w* footsteps \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* king.
